title: Is it possible to see your IP address from the last games
body: I've been hacked recently, and I want to see who went into my account by an ip adress

replies.body:
Unfortunately, there's not. If you're been hacked recently, it's a good idea to change the passwords for both your League account and Email associated with it, along with ensuring they're both unique and in no way related or similar. Additionally, the following links provide some value to securing your account.

[Summoner Safety Initiative](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664)

[Account Management](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect)

[Email Verification](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751744)

Let me know if you have any questions.
